modShortDescription: This mod adds recipes that allow you to convert standard (stone, iron & steel) arrows to crossbow bolts and vice versa.
modDescription:
This mod adds recipes that allow you to convert standard (stone, iron & steel) arrows to crossbow [bolts](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) and vice versa.

**[Download](http://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/Arrow-XbowConversion.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8777-lucs-modlet-collection-quality-bonuses-better-stamina-terrain-mv-spd-etc/).

**Credits:** [Luc](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/luc/)
